content: readme.md restful web framework generator overviewswagger py codegen is python web framework generator, can help generate python web framework automatically based a given swagger specification doc. currently, following languages/frameworks are supported:flask (python)tornado (python)falcon (python)alpha version now, may handle validation properly. you found bug, feel free contact .installpip install swagger-py-codegenusagecreate :swagger_py_codegen --swagger-doc api.yml example-appcommand options:-s, --swagger, --swagger-doc swagger doc file. [required]-f, --force force overwrite.-p, --package package name / application name.-t, --template-dir path your custom templates directory.--spec, --specification generate online specification json response.--ui generate swagger ui.-j, --jobs integer parallel jobs processing.-tlp, --templates gen flask/tornado/falcon templates, default flask.--version show current version.--help show message exit.examples:generate example-app api.yml:flask example$tree.|__ api.yml$ swagger_py_codegen -s api.yml example-app -p demo$ tree (flask-demo).|__ api.yml|__ example-app |__ demo | |__ __init__.py |
